==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|あさ|めし}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=あさめし|朝|tr1=asa|t1=morning|飯|tr2=meshi|t2=cooked rice or other grains, meal}}.

====Pronunciation====
* [[kun'yomi|Kun'yomi]].
* {{IPA|/a̠sa̠ me̞ɕi/|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|あさめし}}

# [[breakfast|Breakfast]].
#: {{ja-usex|いつも何時に'''朝飯'''を食べますか。|いつも なんじ に '''あさめし''' を たべます か。|When do you usually eat '''breakfast'''?}}

=====Usage notes=====
This is the most common pronunciation of this term.

=====Derived terms=====
* {{ja-r|朝飯前|あさめしまえ}}: A [[piece of cake]], something very easy.

{{ja-kanjitab|あさ|いい}}

====Pronunciation====
* [[kun'yomi|Kun'yomi]].
* {{IPA|/a̠sa̠ iː/|lang=ja}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|あさいい|hhira=あさいひ}}

# [[breakfast|Breakfast]].

{{ja-kanjitab|あさ|はん}}
